text: Hey all! So, I have been working with <@UDP5WL2RX> to port over a theme to Franklin and I have a confession to make: aside from running Franklin using the great documentation on the doc page for Franklin, I have no idea how to really work with/develop with Franklin. I feel bad pinging <@UDP5WL2RX> and other maintainers about issues I am running into that are easily solvable. I tried searching for Franklin developer docs - is there anything like this that I am missing? Does anyone have any suggestions to help with learning about the Franklin codebase? Many thanks! :juliaheartpulse-dark:

text:
I think the docs hang behind from time to time as <@UDP5WL2RX> is developing very fast.
I suggest to just ask here and we try to help and maybe you can improve the docs. Then it's a win for all sides :wink:

text: Working through the documentation that exists at <https://franklinjl.org/> is of course an appreciated first step :smile:

elements.text: Working through the documentation that exists at
is of course an appreciated first step

text: Definitely working through the docs is the first thing! I was just wondering if there was anythhing else I should be aware of! I was also thinking about adding some more docs about translating themes to Franklin as I have been working so we shall see how that goes. :memo:

elements.text: Definitely working through the docs is the first thing! I was just wondering if there was anythhing else I should be aware of! I was also thinking about adding some more docs about translating themes to Franklin as I have been working so we shall see how that goes.

text: it definitely helps if you ask your questions here as it helps highlight what's missing in the docs (or what's poorly explained)
